name: Peng: Definitive Edition
description:
Grab a friend and utilize your elemental powers to fight for the fate of the universe.  or you can play by your self against the AI.

How to play:

  xbox: -joystick to move up and down 

               - a for earth, b for fire, y for air, and x for water.

keyboard: - "Q" and "A" for up and down movement

                       - "D" for water, "F" for earth, "R" for air, and "G" for fire.
